content:
On today's call at 2PM ET, we will be reviewing additional use cases for the Consent resource. Please join us!
https://www.freeconferencecall.com/wall/cbhs/
Dial-in Number: (515) 604-9861; Access Code: 429554
When is a good time to discuss Permission?
I would want to make sure we have both Security and CBCP reps on the call. @John Moehrke when's the next time you can be at a FHIR Consent call?

When is a good time to discuss Permission?

You indicated that this was explicitly NOT a "Consent" topic, therefore it falls to the FHIR Security call. We will discuss it when you are present.

On today's call at 2PM ET, we will be reviewing additional use cases for the Consent resource. Please join us!
https://www.freeconferencecall.com/wall/cbhs/
Dial-in Number: (515) 604-9861; Access Code: 429554

thanks for the reminder. I still had it as bi-weekly. The HL7 calls are not managed well enough to be so dynamic.
